content: your #freebeefridayknits for august… rhino baby who doesn t love these most precious of creatures - almost pre-historic and certainly characterful my homage hopes to bring out all the loveliness and tremendous personality these creatures inhere that said - this pattern is fairly quick and easy and guess what… the ratty s jumper which isn t included in this free pattern made so famous by india rose crawford s frog films also fits result enjoy and to see more of the same knitting pattern-wise please visit me here @dotpebbles_knits via instagram 1 1 http //www instagram com/dotpebbles_knits/
